books.title: Project Nemesis
books.author: Jeremy Robinson
books.synopsis: Jon Hudson, lead investigator for the Department of Homeland Security's Fusion Center-P, is tasked with investigating paranormal threats. When a massive creature emerges from the New England wilderness, Hudson teams up with local sheriff Ashley Collins to confront the beast, which seems to be connected to a secret government project.

books.title: Horus Rising
books.author: Dan Abnett
books.synopsis: In the 31st millennium, the Emperor of Mankind leads humanity in a Great Crusade to unite the galaxy. Warmaster Horus, his most trusted son, is tasked with leading the Emperor's forces. As Horus grapples with the burden of command, dark forces conspire to corrupt him and bring about the fall of mankind.

books.title: Armour of Faith
books.author: Graeme Lyon
books.synopsis: Sister Superior Miriya of the Adepta Sororitas is renowned for her unyielding faith and combat prowess. When she is assigned to investigate a heretical uprising on the planet Hollos, Miriya uncovers a conspiracy that threatens the very heart of the Imperium.

books.title: Soul Hunter
books.author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
books.synopsis: The Night Lords, a renegade Space Marine Legion, are feared throughout the galaxy for their brutality. Talos, a warrior plagued by visions, leads his warband in a quest for vengeance against the Imperium. As they navigate the treacherous politics of the Chaos warlords, Talos must confront his own destiny.

books.title: Strength of a Thousand
books.author: Ryan Tang
books.synopsis: As the Indomitus Crusade rages on, the Adeptus Astartes of the Thousand Sons Chapter are tasked with defending the Imperium from the encroaching forces of Chaos. Brother-Captain Ahriman leads his warriors into battle, determined to uphold the honor of his Chapter.

books.title: Unity
books.author: Jeremy Robinson
books.synopsis: The world is in chaos as massive creatures known as kaiju wreak havoc across the globe. Jon Hudson and the Fusion Center-P team join forces with Nemesis, a kaiju with a human conscience, to confront a new threat that could spell the end of humanity.

books.title: TimeRiders
books.author: Alex Scarrow
books.synopsis: Liam O'Connor, Maddy Carter, and Sal Vikram are recruited by a secret agency to protect history from time travelers who seek to alter the past. As TimeRiders, they must prevent changes that could destroy the world, all while uncovering the mysteries of their own origins.

books.title: Nightbringer
books.author: Graham McNeill
books.synopsis: Captain Uriel Ventris of the Ultramarines is dispatched to the planet Pavonis to quell civil unrest. As he investigates, Uriel uncovers a sinister plot involving an ancient alien artifact known as the Nightbringer, which threatens to unleash unimaginable destruction.

books.title: Minka Lesk: The Last Whiteshield
books.author: Justin D. Hill
books.synopsis: Minka Lesk, a young recruit in the Astra Militarum, finds herself as the sole survivor of her regiment after a brutal battle. Determined to honor her fallen comrades, Minka embarks on a perilous mission to deliver vital intelligence that could turn the tide of war.

books.title: Island 731
books.author: Jeremy Robinson
books.synopsis: Captain Uriel Ventris of the Ultramarines is dispatched to the planet Pavonis to quell civil unrest. As he investigates, Uriel uncovers a sinister plot involving an ancient alien artifact known as the Nightbringer, which threatens to unleash unimaginable destruction.
